level.heading: Assistant Director of Public Health to be physician and discharge duties of health officer during his absence or disability.
level.text: The Assistant Director of Public Health shall be a physician, and during the absence of or disability of the Director of Public Health shall act as Director of Public Health and discharge the duties incident to that position.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-101.
